title: Update an Aircraft Maintenance Manual (AMM)
description: A manufacturer has issued a revision to a maintenance procedure. A technical writer must update the company's AMM.

tasks.description: Receive the service bulletin from the manufacturer detailing the changes to the procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the document and the affected AMM section.

tasks.description: Revise the text and diagrams in the specified AMM section to reflect the new procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately updates the content in the technical manual.

tasks.description: Publish the revised manual and notify all maintenance personnel of the update.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully publishes the new version and sends a notification to all relevant staff.
